channel.title: Help please
channel.description: can anyone tell me how to delete doors or keep them open? and how can i make the noc attack back?

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

[quote=“server needer, post:1, topic:271084”]can anyone tell me how to delete doors or keep them open?
and how can i make the noc attack back?[/quote]

Server Needer, in your source you should have a notepad named “doors”, go into that and look for X,Y coords for the door you want to delete and it should be in the list, Simply erase that one. I don’t think there is a way to keep them open unless a player activates them and the doors open that way. Try this, Maybe it’ll help you:

//FACE: 0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH
//ADDED 7 door as a example -bakatool
//FACE = FACE BEGIN WITH
//FACEOPEN = FACE OPENED DOOR
//FACECLOSED = FACE CLOSED DOOR
//HEIGHT 0 = GROUND LVL, 1 IS UP LADDER, 2 IS UP UP LADDER, 3 = UNDERGROUND.

Read full topic

item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Deleteobjects() method; edit your process() method in your NPCHandler class to make the NPCs aggressive.
